name: toonix
label: Toonix
description: Toonix is a set of custom C++ ICE Nodes to generate Toon Lines, it supports Silhouette Detection, Boundary Detection,Intersection Detection(WIP) Crease Detection, Edge Cluster Detection, as well as experimental light and shadow approximation. It outputs on-the-fly polymesh geometry.

name: voronoi
label: Voronoi
description: Voronoi is a softimage plugin to shatter 3D objects

name: usd_read
label: Usd Read
description: A softimage plugin to read usd and display it in the viewport

name: usd_write
label: Usd Write
description: A softimage plugin to export scene to usd file format
